CustomField.description: Used in the last four nodes of the 'Add Welcome/Trial Kit Products on Closing' Process Builder. Checks first if an oppty needs a Commercial Field Services kit, then if it needs a Commercial Food and Beverage kit, then an Express Welcome kit, then finally a Standard Welcome kit.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Revenue Opportunity"), Amount >= 30000, First_Purchase__c = true, Renewal__c = false, ISNULL(Account.Welcome_Kit_Sent_Date__c), Probability >= 0.95, ISPICKVAL(Shipping_Country__c, "United States") ), "Standard Welcome Kit", "" )
CustomField.label: Welcome Kit Type
